actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to amend the Economic Stabilization Act of 1970, to exempt stabilization of the price of gasoline at the retail level from coverage under the act.

summary.text: Prohibits the stabilization of the price of gasoline at the retail level under the Economic Stabilization Act of 1970.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Economic Stabilization Act of 1970, to exempt stabilization of the price of gasoline at the retail level from coverage under the act.
